title: Norway Norwegian Flag Pendant with Sterling Silver Plated Chain
features: 3D urethane encased design on pendant as shown
description: This charming pendant will spruce up any outfit and become your go to favorite accessory! The pendant is sterling silver plated and approximately 1” in diameter with the delightful 3D urethane encased design as shown. The included snake chain is 22” in length, made from brass and 95.5% sterling silver plated, and closes with a spring ring clasp. Please note that the sterling silver plated items can tarnish over time when exposed to the air, but can be easily cleaned with a silver polishing cream.
